string.value: |It's a dangerous place. I don't want to get into this swamp without an important reason.
|This seems to be the place Homer was talking about. I'll try to cross the swamp here.
|The old man was right, there was a solid bottom beneath the layer of mud. I wonder what is waiting for me on the other side?
GUARD|Do not approach! Any suspicious actions will be considered an act of aggression!
|You carry the cargo I need. I will pay you generously for it.
GUARD|Attempted bribery of an official on duty!
|Looks like I'm going to have to do this the hard way. Let the prisoner go and get the hell out of here. You won't get a second chance.
GUARD|Everyone to the guns! Let's show this impudent man what happens when you mess with law enforcement!
|That's your choice to make. The main thing is not to hit the trailer with the prisoner. The rest can burn in flames!
|What are you waiting for? Get in my truck. Hurry, they could have called for help.
LEADER|Thank you for freeing me, stranger. But what are your motives? I'm not sure I can trust you.
|I made a deal with your men that I would free you in exchange for the one thing I need. And they had better hold up their part of the bargain!
|Unfortunately, the trailer with the prisoner got blown up in the heat of the battle. He's dead, and I have nothing to offer to the extremists...
|Guess I'll have to take the warehouse by force. Piece of cake!
CLAW|Forbidden Zone!
|Oh, my God! What the...? Just what could the people of old need such machines for?
|This monster guards the passage to the Sea Gate. I need to find a way to defeat it... I'm not sure if regular bullets will work on its body.
|This is the place that Homer mentioned, but I don't see any gate. Was it all for nothing?!
|What's that coming out of the water? I just killed one monster and another one's on the way...
|It seems he's inviting me into his jaws. So this is the Sea Gate! In the belly of the beast I will swim to the Oracle. It's scary, of course... But I've got nothing to lose.
|These bandits won’t trouble traders no more!
|The only thing left is to inform Ohlm’s people that the warehouse is free.
Do you wish to travel to another region?
I don’t know the way, so I’ll better stay here.
There’s something strange about this place. I don’t want to go there.
